body:
Hi Marija,


I have attached a file that should (highly dependent on non-munging by
email) contain the correct spacing of the header portion of the file.
The data needs to have the same spacing.

I suspect the problem with the (1) definition is that you do not have
the header in the file or the file is not correctly formated.


--
# Jack de Valpine

subject: [Radiance-general] glazing modelling
